name: Old cloth work gloves
data: It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It decreases the users dexterity pitifully.
It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It increases the users wisdom pitifully.
It increases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has adequate armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'offensive efficiency'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users fire resistance strongly.
